63827.credit_line: Bequest of Eleanor Harter McFarland of Kalamazoo, Michigan, a former resident of Indianapolis, who studied at the Herron School of Art

Her bequest to IMA in 2006.

30212.title: pair of andirons
30212.description: Pair of brass and iron andirons. Each andiron with an urn having rams head handles and draped with oak leaf garland. The plinth with a pine-cone finial. Pine-cone log stop.
30212.credit_line: Gift of the Children of J.K. Lilly Jr.
30212.inscription:
Incised cast in relief on extension bars: W.H. Jackson, Co. New York 
Incised cast in relief at underside: patented Dec. 8, 1908

35783.title: pair of andirons
35783.description: Pair of silver plated brass andirons with urn-form finials with applied male masks above tapering square shafts with relief bellflowers. Fluted tapering legs with urn finials.
35783.credit_line: Gift of the Children of J.K. Lilly Jr.
35783.provenance: Andirons and their attached log supports are part of the gift of the house and contents to the Art Association of Indianapolis from J.K. Lilly Jr. as shown by being "Susan Hallis" (SH) items. They are pictured in the visual SH inventory, but are not listed as having accession numbers in the SH list. Historic photographs from the 1930s and 1960s show this suite of fireplace equipment in the dining room.
35783.inscription:
Incised cast on log support, at top: [PAT]ED DEC. 8, 1908
Incised cast on log support, at underside: WM. H. JACKSON CO., NY

51661.title: Portrait Medallion: J.K. Lilly

51661.inscription:

Inscribed, verso: 1876/ Commemorating/ the Fiftieth Anniversary/ of the Founding of/ Eli Lilly and Company/ and/ the Fiftieth Anniversary of the connection with/ the company of/ Josiah Kirby Lilly/ Its Beloved President/ 1926
